sqlMap.select:
select distinct a.staff_id,c.staff_name, b.role_id, b.unit_id, d.unit_name, b.posi_id from SYS_POSI_ASSIGN a left join SYS_POSITION b on a.posi_id=b.posi_id left join SYS_STAFF c on a.STAFF_ID = c.STAFF_ID left join SYS_UNIT d on b.unit_id=d.unit_id WHERE a.POSI_ID IN (select posi_id from SYS_POSITION b
inner join SYS_UNITMAP m on m.rela_unitid=b.unit_id
where b.ROLE_ID = #roleId#
m.UNIT_ID = #operUnitid#
) and c.STAFF_STATUS = '1'

select count(distinct a.staff_id) as count from SYS_POSI_ASSIGN a left join SYS_STAFF c on a.STAFF_ID = c.STAFF_ID WHERE a.POSI_ID IN (select posi_id from SYS_POSITION b
inner join SYS_UNITMAP m on m.rela_unitid=b.unit_id
where b.ROLE_ID = #roleId#
m.UNIT_ID = #operUnitid#
) and c.STAFF_STATUS = '1'

select distinct a.*,c.UNIT_NAME,a.OWNER_UNITID as UNIT_ID from SYS_STAFF a left join SYS_ROLE_ASSIGN b on a.STAFF_ID = b.STAFF_ID left join SYS_UNIT c on a.OWNER_UNITID = c.UNIT_ID
inner join SYS_UNITMAP m on m.rela_unitid=c.unit_id
where a.STAFF_STATUS = '1' a.STAFF_NAME like '$staffName$%' a.STAFF_ID = #staffId# m.UNIT_ID = #unitId# b.ROLE_ID = #roleId#

select count(distinct a.STAFF_ID) from SYS_STAFF a left join SYS_ROLE_ASSIGN b on a.STAFF_ID = b.STAFF_ID left join SYS_UNIT c on a.OWNER_UNITID = c.UNIT_ID
inner join SYS_UNITMAP m on m.rela_unitid=c.unit_id
where a.STAFF_STATUS = '1' a.STAFF_NAME like '$staffName$%' a.STAFF_ID = #staffId# m.UNIT_ID = #unitId# b.ROLE_ID = #roleId#
sqlMap.delete: delete from SYS_POSITION where posi_id=#value# and not exists (select posi_id from SYS_POSI_ASSIGN WHERE posi_id=#value#)
